Position: Senior Data Engineer (Analytics Platform)
Level: Band 8 — Hybrid (Sydney preferred)
Summary: The Senior Data Engineer designs, builds, and maintains reliable data pipelines and platform capabilities enabling analytics at scale. This role improves platform reliability and observability, and mentors engineers to uplift best practices.
Key Responsibilities:
• Build and maintain robust data ingestion and transformation pipelines (Python, SQL, Airflow, dbt).
• Improve data platform reliability, performance, and observability (monitoring, alerting, SLOs).
• Collaborate with platform, analytics, and product teams to deliver trusted data products.
• Champion engineering standards, documentation, and operational excellence.
• Mentor engineers and contribute to hiring and onboarding.
Skills & Experience:
• 5+ years in data engineering with production-grade ETL/ELT.
• Strong Python and SQL, orchestration (Airflow), and transformation (dbt).
• Cloud data platforms (AWS), CI/CD, IaC, and observability tooling.
• Communication skills to partner across technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Policies & Benefits:
• Hybrid Work Policy (3 days in-office).
• Benefits aligned to Bands 7–9 (leave, health, allowances).
I’ve packaged this PD into a document. You can download it here: /downloads/pd_senior_data_engineer.docx
